trends: There have been no other sightings in Uriah
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: large orange ball appeared then moved horozontally then broke off into another ball then a third one apperead
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting Detailslooking north at about 9:30 pm on may 22 and 23 I saw an orange ball appear just above the tree line it hovered then it moved to the right and split into to balls. They hovered and circled one another then a third orange ball appered in the same spot the first one occured. within a few seconds the 2 balls came back together to become one and then all there just dissaperead. the second night i saw one orange ball break off into 2 then go back together and then dissappear. I saw it two more time between 8:30 and 10:00 pm. When it would appear and dissapear it would resemble a light being turned on but slowly. I would grow and get brighter over 1-2 sec.
